TopicTitle: "Warp to" button doesnt always return to 1x time acceleration

Articles.Content:
Basically, what the title says: i've noticed that when using "warp to" button on my craft's trajectory, it doesnt always slow down to 1x time acceleration once it arrives at the point (sometimes staying on 100x).

Does this happen to anyone else? Does anyone know what causes it or how to fix it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T17:20:30Z" title="05/03/2015 05:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by arkie87**

I've had this happen several times, but it seems to mostly occur on hyperbolic orbits such as mun encounters. At this point I just rely on KAC to do the job instead since most of the time I'm only interested in Ap/Pe/AN/DN or a maneuver node ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Yeah It's broken. I recommend Kerbal Alarm Clock.
